title: Remdesivir
summary: Remdesivir, sold under the brand name Veklury,[10][11] is a broad-spectrum antiviral medication developed by the biopharmaceutical company Gilead Sciences.[12] It is administered via injection into a vein.[13][14] During the COVID-19 pandemic, remdesivir was approved or authorized for emergency use to treat COVIDâ€‘19 in around 50 countries.[15] Updated guidelines from the World Health Organization in November 2020 include a conditional recommendation against the use of remdesivir for the treatment of COVID-19.[16]
